recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis Internasional, Administrasi Bisnis, Bahasa Mandarin untuk Komunikasi Bisnis dan Profesional, Bahasa Mandarin, Administrasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
1.Support to Manage end-to-end recruitment process 
2.Support Develop and maintain talent pipelines for current and future hiring needs.
3.Support Collaborate with users to define job requirements and candidate profiles.
4.Support Coordinate internal company events and engagement programs.
5.Support Help organize employee engagement initiatives, training programs, and culture-building activities.
6.Support Establish Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that are aligned with the company's goals and targets.
7.Support Data Management: Maintain and update employee data.
